name: Projectforlyz.GitHub.io
body:
Here are all of my projects:

[project1](https://github.com/projectforlyz/project1) 

[project2](https://github.com/projectforlyz/project2)

[project3](https://github.com/projectforlyz/project3)

[project4](https://github.com/projectforlyz/project4)

Maybe they are not good, but I will try my best to learn more about secure software design and complete more good programs.
I have learnt a lot of knowledge about C++, all kinds of compilers, the knowledge of database such as sqlite, especially the knowledge of encryption. Encryption and how to make a secure software is what I am really interested in. I will keep on learning on these fields. 
Thank you Professor Ninja!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
